leaps

			
			'''
			Every four years
				except if divisible by


				Leap Years:
					2000
					2004

				Not Leap Years:
					1900
					1800
					1700


			'''
			def is_leap_year (year):
				if (year % 4 != 0):
					return false;

				'''
					2000 -> Yes
					1900 -> No
					1800 -> No
					1700 -> No
					1600 -> Yes

					Divisble by 100, but not divisible by 400 -> not a leap year
				'''
				if (year % 100 == 0 && year % 400 != 0):
					return false

				return true;

			def is_leap_second ():
				return;
